item.title: How to contact the ISS with a Baofeng
item.description: I’ve been a bit obsessed with trying to talk to space lately Did you know the International Space Station has a ham radio repeater? I’ve known this for years but now that I’m in the world of ham radio, I can do something about it. First off you should know what I’m working with: Baofeng UV-5R 4w Ed Fong Dual Band DBJ-1 Why would you want to do this?
